component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Default task
Added Rule model and rule import routine
Added Rule model and rule import routine
Added description for intermediate class
Adjust to ManyToMany-Representation of sentence-rule-relations
Bugfix: MODE-order not consistent Bugfix: allow (,) in example sentences
Some length fixes for get_comma_list etc.
Add umlauts and ! to lexer wordchars
Remove unneccessary debug output
- Added real sentences - Some minor UI tweaks - Activate random choosing of task types
- ASCII template names
- CSS tweaks - Disabled XFrameOptions middleware (we want to embed!) - added allowed sites to settings
- new concept: activated rules - user progress method to activate new rules - welcome message - introduction of new rules after level raise
- basic auth login (username = password) - new task type: correct commas - new task type: explain commas - reset action
- fill solution table (first version)
- fill solution table (first version)
- "Regeln im Fokus" statt Liste - Regel-Paragraf als Titel - Kommas linksbündig
- Fragebogen zum Einsiteg - Umstellung auf Bootstrap
- neue Regel: Vorfeldkomma - Neue Beispielsätze
- Zeitmessung - Vollständige Lösungen für Korrektur-Aufgaben
- 20% chance for random commas in correction task
- Count sentence uses for user, select least often used sentences - bootstrap grid - correct count of correction task - statistics per rule - minor changes
- complete rework of explanation tasks - interface tweaks - css nicer - example sentences
- corrected redirection after registration for subdir installations
- corrected redirection after registration for subdir installations
- display correct sentence with rule hints after task submission
- display correct sentence with rule hints after task submission
- use static tags in templates
- rule and sentence corrections - questionnaire corrections
- authentication via url parameter (for Stud.IP embedding) - connection to django auth user system - rule counter - rule expanation formatting
